column1: Applied Artificial Intelligence and Data Analytics MSc
column3: Faculty of Management, Law and Social Sciences
column5: *SCHOLARSHIPS AVAILABLE*This new MSc programme has been designed in response to the shortage of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Data Science (DS) specialists in the UK. It will give you the skills and professional insight you need to launch a career in these diverse and fast-growing sectors.A number of £10,000 scholarships will be offered to Home students attending this programme, as part of a £1.3m investment by Office for Students (OfS), Department for Culture, Media and Sport (DCMS), Office for Artificial Intelligence and industry contributions.
column9: 1 year Full-time, plus a 3 month paid industry placement; 2 years Part-time, plus a 3 month paid industry placement
